title: Typophile Cherry Popped
content:
Hey Guys,

This is my first post, and just as a slight apology, I'm a designer and not even close to a typographer, so take it easy on me. All that being said... here's a font I made one afternoon.

If you'd like to see a few more images: [http://www.everythingsbeendone.com/pancake.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202405/http:/www.everythingsbeendone.com/pancake.html "http://www.everythingsbeendone.com/pancake.html")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202405im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pancake_01_6270.jpg)
author: eric wagliardo

comments.content: You're not a student at QCA are you?
no lower cases either. i'm such a slacker. Tell, I don't go to QCA. I graduated a while ago and live in NY. Is someone copping my pancakes down at QCA?
Very creative! And now you just made me hungry for pancakes :P
